definition[0]: to reach the age when you are legally considered to be a responsible adult
definition[1]: if something comes of age, it reaches a stage of development at which people accept it as being important, valuable etc
example[0]: During this period the movies really came of age as an art form.
definition[2]: to reach the age when you are legally considered to be an adult
example[1]: He’ll inherit the money when he comes of age.
definition[3]: to develop into an advanced or successful form
example[2]: Space technology didn’t really come of age until the 1950s.
